entry.title: Jerma and Ster Streams - DS2 [with Chat]

media:group.media:title: Jerma and Ster Streams - DS2 [with Chat]
media:group.media:description:
Jerma archived Dark Souls 2 (The original title of this stream was "Another Day, Another Souls", and was originally streamed/recorded on July 21st, 2018) Thanks to Catb0t for setting this stream with chat up.
(Note: This channel is not run by Jerma/Ster, just a couple of fans wanting to archive the streams for a later date, and just for the community of fans.)
Join our discord: https://discord.gg/xUeJCZa
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/jerma985 Twitter:https://twitter.com/Jerma985 Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Jerma985 YouTube 2nd/Highlight channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL7DDQWP6x7wy0O6L5ZIgxg6
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/ster Twitter: https://twitter.com/SterLovesFood Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/ster Ster2: https://www.youtube.com/user/4O4STAR/undefined

entry.title: Channel Update Video (This Channel Ending, What Now?)

media:group.media:title: Channel Update Video (This Channel Ending, What Now?)
media:group.media:description:
Thanks for all the support these 2 years. We hope to see you guys in the new channels. If the video seems long, sorry about that, there's timestamps in the comments if you wanna skip around. If you have any questions, feel free to talk to me in the discord.
Links: Ster's New Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAVr-0Ogi_pjnJpkZ4ZEJHQ Jerma's New Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2oWuUSd3t3t5O3Vxp4lgAA Jerma Chat Extension: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/jerma-chat-replay/mhmnnekcdlaeppkkijambmecklomdnla Our Tip Jar: https://ko-fi.com/sterjermastreamarchive Join Our Discord: https://discord.gg/DQY9eM6

entry.title: Jerma Streams - Bloodborne, Peggle 2, and GTA Online

media:group.media:title: Jerma Streams - Bloodborne, Peggle 2, and GTA Online
media:group.media:description:
Jerma archived Bloodborne, Peggle 2, and GTA Online (The original title of this stream was "Until They Turn Us Off", and was originally streamed/recorded on September 30th, 2018) This video is part of a larger stream that went 1. Going Away Party [with Guests], 2. L.A. Noire (Part 2), 3. Minecraft, 4. Bloodborne, Peggle 2, and GTA Online
(Note: This channel is not run by Jerma/Ster, just a couple of fans wanting to archive the streams for a later date, and just for the community of fans.)
Join our discord: https://discord.gg/xUeJCZa
